subject: Rowing
lead_paragraph: Harvard won the 147th Harvard-Yale Regatta, completing the four-mile race on the Thames River in New London, Conn., in 19 minutes, 41.3 seconds. Yale finished in 19:51.2.
snippet: Harvard won the 147th Harvard-Yale Regatta, completing the four-mile race on the Thames River in New London, Conn., in 19 minutes, 41.3 seconds. Yale finished in 19:51.2.
